data.prayer: Spirit, please convict the believers in Đắk Lắk, Vietnam to not assume the ministry is for professional clergy, but for all who have been called by you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Đắk Lắk, Vietnam
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Jesus, protect the vulnerable in Đắk Lắk, Vietnam from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 46 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, strengthen the church in Đắk Lắk, Vietnam by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Đắk Lắk, Vietnam.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Khang people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Đắk Lắk.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, look after and teach the way that is best for the 37,485 believers living in Đắk Lắk, Vietnam.
data.verse: I will instruct you and teach you in the way you should go. I will counsel you with my loving eye on you.

data.section_summary:
the state of Đắk Lắk, Vietnam has a population of 1,733,100.

We estimate Đắk Lắk has 37,485 people who might know Jesus, 139,016 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,556,598 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 46 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Đắk Lắk, Vietnam. Show them that faithfulness is better than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
